headline: The Bull Case For Blackstone (BX) Could Change Following Trump’s Crackdown On Institutional Home Buying
summary: Earlier this week, U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order aimed at curbing Wall Street investors, including Blackstone, from buying and speculating on single-family homes, directing federal agencies to design enforcement within 60 days. This policy move directly challenges a core pillar of Blackstone’s real estate model, spotlighting regulatory risk around institutional ownership of U.S. housing. Against this backdrop, we’ll examine how the new single-family housing...
